ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS

block.text: EPHESIANS

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 1
Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus through the will of God, to the saints who are at Ephesus, and the faithful in Christ Jesus:

block.text: Mi Pol, mi aposel bilong Krais Jisas. Long laik bilong em yet God i makim mi olsem aposel. Mi raitim dispela pas long yupela ol manmeri bilong God i stap long taun Efesus na i bihainim tru Krais Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace to you and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: God Papa bilong yumi, wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais, i ken marimari long yupela na mekim bel bilong yupela i stap isi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ;

block.text: Yumi litimapim nem bilong God, em i God na Papa bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais. Long Krais em i bin givim yumi olgeta gutpela samting bilong heven, bilong helpim spirit bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: even as he chose us in him before the foundation of the world, that we would be holy and without blemish before him in love;

block.text: Taim God i no mekim graun i kamap yet, na em i makim yumi pinis long pas wantaim Krais, bai yumi ken i stap holi. Bai yumi ken i stap stretpela manmeri na i no gat asua long ai bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He predestined us for adoption as children through Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his desire.

block.text: Bipo yet em i laikim yumi tumas, na em i makim yumi bilong kamap pikinini bilong em yet long wok Jisas Krais bai i mekim bilong kisim bek yumi. Long laik bilong em yet God i mekim olsem.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We give thanks to God for his grace, by which he has accepted us in the Beloved.

block.text: Long nem bilong dispela Pikinini em i laikim tumas, God i bin marimari moa yet long yumi. Olsem na yumi mas ting long dispela bikpela marimari bilong em na yumi mas litimapim nem bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In him we have our redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace,

block.text: Marimari bilong God em i pulap tru. Krais i dai pinis bilong baim bek yumi, na long blut bilong en, God i lusim olgeta sin bilong yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: which he made to abound toward us in all wisdom and prudence,

block.text: God i kapsaitim marimari bilong en moa yet long yumi, na em i givim olgeta kain save wantaim gutpela tingting long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He makes known to us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he purposed in Christ.

block.text: Bipo God i tingting pinis long dispela samting em i laik mekim long wok bilong Krais. Tasol dispela tingting bilong en i bin i stap hait, na nau em i soim yumi pinis dispela tingting bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This plan is to be put into effect when the times have reached their fulfillment, to bring all things in heaven and on earth together under one head, even Christ.

block.text: Dispela samting em i laik mekim em i olsem. Em i laik stiaim olgeta samting i go i go, na long dispela taim em i makim pinis, em bai i bungim olgeta samting long Krais, ol samting bilong heven na bilong graun tu. Na Krais i ken i stap het bilong olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In him also we were assigned an inheritance, having been foreordained. And this according to the purpose of him who works all things after the counsel of his will.

block.text: God i save bihainim laik na tingting bilong em yet na mekim olgeta samting i kamap, na long laik bilong em, bipo yet em i makim mipela Juda bilong pas wantaim Krais na kamap lain manmeri tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We who were the first to trust in Christ should thank him for his greatness.

block.text: Mipela Juda, mipela ol namba wan lain i bin bilip long Krais na bihainim em, na God i makim mipela bilong tingting oltaim long bikpela lait na strong bilong em na litimapim nem bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You also, having heard the word of the truth, the Good News of your salvation in whom, having also believed, you were sealed with the Holy Spirit of promise,

block.text: Na yupela ol manmeri bilong ol arapela lain, yupela tu i harim pinis tok tru, em dispela gutnius bilong God i kisim bek yupela. Na yupela i bilip pinis long Krais. Olsem na yupela i pas wantaim Krais, na God i bihainim promis em i bin mekim bipo na em i givim Holi Spirit long yupela, olsem mak bilong yupela i stap lain manmeri bilong em stret.

ReferenceBlocks.text: who is a pledge of our inheritance, to the redemption of God’s own possession, to the praise of his glory.

block.text: Yumi kisim Holi Spirit pinis, olsem na yumi save, bihain yumi bai kisim tu olgeta arapela gutpela samting God i bin promis long givim long ol manmeri bilong en. Yumi wet long kisim ol dispela samting long taim God i kisim bek yumi na yumi stap fri tru wantaim em. Na yumi bai tingting long ol dispela strongpela wok em i bin mekim na yumi bai litimapim biknem bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause I also, having heard of the faith in the Lord Jesus which is among you, and the love which you have toward all the saints,

block.text: Mi harim tok long yupela i bilip tru long Bikpela Jisas, na yupela i save givim bel bilong yupela long olgeta manmeri bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: don’t cease to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers.

block.text: Olsem na taim mi mekim prea, oltaim mi save tingting long yupela na tenkyu long God. Na mi save prea

ReferenceBlocks.text: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give to you a spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him.

block.text: long God bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais, em Papa i stap nambawan tru wantaim bikpela lait na strong bilong en, em i ken givim gutpela tingting long yupela na mekim yupela i save gut long as bilong tok bilong em, bai yupela i ken save gut long em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray also that the eyes of your hearts are enlightened, that you may know what is the hope of his calling. and what are the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

block.text: Mi laik bai em i givim lait long tingting bilong yupela, bai yupela i ken save gut long ol dispela samting em i singautim yupela bilong kisim, em ol samting yupela i wetim i stap. Olsem bai yupela i save long ol dispela gutpela gutpela samting God i bin makim bilong yumi ol manmeri bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and what is the exceeding greatness of his power toward us who believe, according to that working of the strength of his might

block.text: Na bai yupela i ken save olsem, dispela strong bilong God oltaim em i wok long helpim yumi ol manmeri i bilip long em, em i bikpela moa moa yet. Yumi no inap tru long skelim strong bilong en. Na dispela bikpela strong bilong God i save wok long yumi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: which he worked in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and made him to sit at his right hand in the heavenly places,

block.text: em tasol bipo i bin wok long Krais. Krais i dai pinis, na long dispela bikpela strong bilong God, God i kirapim em na i bringim em i go sindaun long han sut bilong em long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: far above all rule, and authority, and power, and dominion. Far above every name that is named, not only in this age, but also in that which is to come.

block.text: Olsem na Krais i stap antap tru long olgeta kain strongpela spirit, na long olgeta hetman na long olgeta gavman, na long olgeta samting i gat strong. Em i stap antap long olgeta man i gat nem nau long dispela taim, na long taim bihain tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He put all things in subjection under his feet, and gave him to be head over all things for the assembly,

block.text: God i bin putim olgeta samting i stap aninit long Krais, na i mekim em i stap het tru bilong olgeta samting, na long dispela pasin em i stap het bilong sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: which is his body, the fullness of him who fills all in all.

block.text: Sios em i bodi bilong Krais. Krais em i stap insait long olgeta samting na i pulapim ol tru, na em i pulap olgeta long sios bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 2
You were made alive when you were dead in transgressions and sins.

block.text: Bipo yupela i save mekim ol kain kain rong na sin, na dispela i kilim yupela i dai.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You walked in the sinful ways of the world, according to the prince of the power of the air. The spirit who now works in the children of disobedience.

block.text: Long dispela taim yupela i bin wokabaut long pasin nogut bilong dispela graun. Yupela i bin bihainim pasin bilong hetman bilong ol spirit nogut i stap long skai, em dispela strongpela spirit i wok yet insait long bel bilong ol man i save sakim tok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We also once lived among them in the lust of our flesh, doing the desires of the flesh and of the mind. We were by nature children of wrath, even as the rest.

block.text: Bipo yumi olgeta i bin i stap wantaim dispela lain, na yumi bihainim laik nogut bilong olpela bel bilong yumi tasol. Yumi bihainim laik bilong dispela olpela bel na laik bilong tingting bilong yumi yet. Na long taim yumi bin i stap olsem, yumi inap kisim pe nogut God i redim pinis bilong givim long olgeta manmeri i mekim dispela kain pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But God, being rich in mercy, for his great love with which he loved us,

block.text: Tru, rong bilong yumi em i kilim yumi na yumi dai pinis. Yumi stap olsem ol man i dai pinis olgeta.

ReferenceBlocks.text: even when we were dead through our trespasses, made us alive together with Christ (by grace you have been saved).

block.text: Tasol marimari bilong God em i pulap tru na em i givim bel bilong en moa yet long yumi. Olsem na em i mekim yumi i stap laip wantaim Krais. Yes, long marimari bilong God tasol em i kisim bek yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He raised us up with him, and made us to sit with him in the heavenly places in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Em i kirapim yumi wantaim Krais Jisas. Na em i mekim yumi i sindaun pinis wantaim Krais long sia king bilong en long heven.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That way, in the ages to come he might show the exceeding riches of his grace in kindness toward us in Christ Jesus;

block.text: Long wok bilong Krais Jisas em i mekim dispela gutpela pasin long yumi, long wanem, em i laik soim bikpela marimari tru bilong en long olgeta man long olgeta taim bihain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For by grace you have been saved through faith, and that not of yourselves; it is the gift of God,

block.text: Yupela i bilip long Krais, na long marimari bilong God tasol, God i kisim bek yupela. Dispela em i no samting yupela yet i mekim. Nogat. God i givim nating long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: not of works, that no one would boast.

block.text: Em i no olsem pe bilong wok yupela i mekim. Olsem na i no gat wanpela man em inap litimapim nem bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared before that we would walk in them.

block.text: Long Krais Jisas God i mekim yumi i kamap ol nupela manmeri, bilong yumi ken wokabaut long rot bilong gutpela pasin bipo yet God i redim pinis bilong yumi ken wokabaut long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore remember that once you, the Gentiles in the flesh, who are called “uncircumcision” by that which is called “circumcision,” (in the flesh, made by hands);

block.text: Yupela i save, ol lain bilong Juda i save katim skin bilong ol man, na ol i save kolim yupela olsem, "Ol man i no save katim skin." Dispela i tok long pasin ol man yet i save mekim long skin bilong ol. Orait yupela i mas tingim gut, bipo yupela i stap man bilong ol arapela lain,

ReferenceBlocks.text: that you were at that time separate from Christ, alienated from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of the promise, having no hope and without God in the world.

block.text: na long dispela taim yupela i stap longwe long Krais. Yupela i stap ausait long lain bilong Israel. God i bin mekim promis na i givim kontrak long ol lain Israel, na yupela i stap ausait long dispela lain. Yupela i stap long dispela graun, na i no gat wanpela gutpela samting i stap bilong yupela i wetim i kamap bihain. Na yupela i no save long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But now in Christ Jesus you who once were far off are made near in the blood of Christ.

block.text: Bipo yupela i stap longwe tru. Tasol nau blut bilong Krais i bringim yupela i kam, na yupela i pas wantaim Krais Jisas na yupela i stap klostu tru long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For he is our peace, who made both one, and broke down the middle wall of partition,

block.text: Krais yet i save mekim yumi i stap bel isi na sindaun gut wantaim. Bipo ol lain Juda i save birua long ol arapela lain, na dispela pasin birua i kamap olsem banis i stap namel long ol Juda na ol man bilong ol arapela lain. Tasol long bodi bilong em yet Krais i brukim pinis dispela banis na i pinisim dispela pasin birua, na em i bungim tupela lain na mekim ol i kamap wanpela lain tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: having abolished in the flesh the hostility, the law of commandments contained in ordinances, that he might create in himself one new man of the two, making peace;

block.text: Em i rausim pinis lo bilong Moses wantaim olgeta hap tok na olgeta lo bilong en. Em i mekim olsem, bai em i ken bungim tupela lain na mekim ol i kamap olsem wanpela nupela man. Na long dispela pasin em i mekim yumi i stap wanbel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and might reconcile them both in one body to God through the cross, having killed the hostility thereby.

block.text: Em i dai long diwai kros bilong bungim dispela tupela lain long wanpela bodi. Na long diwai kros em i kilim i dai dispela pasin birua i bin i stap bipo.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He came and preached peace to you who were far off and to those who were near.

block.text: Em i kam na i autim gutnius olsem, "Nau yupela i stap wanbel." Em i autim dispela gutnius long yupela ol lain i stap long ol longwe ples, na long ol manmeri i stap klostu tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For through him we both have our access in one Spirit to the Father.

block.text: Yumi stap wanbel, long wanem, long Krais yumi tupela lain wantaim i gat wanpela Spirit i opim rot bilong yumi ken kamap long Papa.

ReferenceBlocks.text: So then you are no longer strangers and foreigners, but you are fellow citizens with the saints, and of the household of God.

block.text: Nau yupela i no moa i stap olsem ol tripman i no gat graun. Nogat. Yupela i wanlain wantaim ol manmeri bilong God. Yupela i stap lain tru bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This family is being built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Christ Jesus himself being the chief cornerstone.

block.text: Yupela i olsem haus God i wokim. Em i bin planim mipela aposel wantaim ol profet olsem pos bilong dispela haus. Na Krais Jisas em i namba wan pos tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The whole building is in him, fitted together, grows into a holy temple in the Lord;

block.text: Olgeta bun bilong dispela haus i pas long Krais, olsem na olgeta i pas gut wantaim. Na God i wokim yet dispela haus, na haus i laik kamap bikpela moa na i stap haus bilong Bikpela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In him you also are built together for a habitation of God in the Spirit.

block.text: Yupela tu i pas long Krais, na God i bungim yupela wantaim ol arapela manmeri bilong en, na yupela i kamap haus tru bilong God, bai em wantaim Holi Spirit i ken i stap long dispela haus.

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 3
For this cause I, Paul, am the prisoner of Christ Jesus on behalf of you Gentiles.

block.text: God i mekim gut tru long yupela, na long dispela as tasol mi Pol mi stap long kalabus, long wanem, mi save mekim wok bilong Krais Jisas bilong helpim yupela man bilong ol arapela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I am sure that you have heard of the administration of that grace of God which was given me toward you.

block.text: Mi ting yupela i harim pinis olsem, God i bin marimari long mi na makim mi bilong mekim dispela wok em i mekim bilong marimari long yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I wrote before in a few words that by revelation, the mystery was made known to me.

block.text: Dispela tok long samting God i mekim, bipo em i stap hait, tasol God yet i bin kamapim long mi, olsem mi stori liklik pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When you read this you can perceive my understanding in the mystery of Christ;

block.text: Na taim yupela i ritim dispela tok, orait yupela bai i save olsem, mi save gut tru long dispela tok hait bilong wok Krais i mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In other generations, this was not made known to the children of men. It has now been revealed to his holy apostles and prophets in the Spirit;

block.text: Long olgeta taim bipo, God i no bin autim klia dispela tok hait. Tasol nau long Holi Spirit, God i autim klia long mipela ol aposel na profet bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that the Gentiles are fellow heirs, and fellow members of the body, and fellow partakers of his promise in Christ Jesus through the Good News.

block.text: Dispela tok i olsem. Long gutnius yupela man bilong ol arapela lain yupela i kamap wanlain na wanpela bodi wantaim mipela. Na yumi olgeta i save kisim olgeta samting God i bin makim bilong yumi long Krais Jisas.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was made a servant of this gospel, according to the gift of that grace of God which was given me according to the working of his power.

block.text: God i mekim mi i kamap wokman bilong autim dispela gutnius. Em i marimari long mi, na em i givim strong bilong en long mi, bilong strongim mi long mekim dispela wok.

ReferenceBlocks.text: To me, the very least of all saints, was this grace given, to preach to the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ,

block.text: Mi aninit tru long olgeta arapela manmeri bilong God, tasol em i marimari long mi na givim dispela wok long mi, em wok bilong autim gutnius long ol arapela lain. Dispela gutnius i tok long olgeta gutpela samting bilong Krais, em yumi ol man i no inap tru long skelim na kaunim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and to make all men see what is the administration of the mystery which for ages has been hidden in God, who created all things through Jesus Christ;

block.text: God i bin wokim olgeta samting, na pastaim em i haitim tingting bilong en long olgeta pasin em i laik mekim. Na dispela tingting i stap hait long olgeta taim bipo. Tasol nau em i givim mi wok bilong autim klia dispela tingting bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This was done so that now through the assembly the manifold wisdom of God might be made known to the principalities and the powers in the heavenly places,

block.text: Bipo em i haitim, tasol nau em i mekim sios bilong en i kamap, na long dispela pasin em i mekim ol kain kain gutpela tingting na save bilong en i kamap ples klia, bai ol strongpela ensel na spirit bilong heven i ken save long tingting bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord.

block.text: Bipo yet God i tingting long mekim ol dispela samting, na nau long wok bilong Krais Jisas, Bikpela bilong yumi, em i mekim pinis.

ReferenceBlocks.text: We can come to God in boldness and access him in confidence through our faith in him.

block.text: Na yumi save bilip long Krais, na yumi no pret. Yumi save gut olsem, Krais em i rot bilong yumi kamap long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore I ask that you may not lose heart at my troubles for you, which are your glory.

block.text: Olsem na mi tokim yupela nau, yupela i no ken tingting planti long dispela pen mi karim bilong helpim yupela, na bai bilip bilong yupela i slek. Nogat. Yupela i ken amamas long dispela samting i kamap, long wanem, em bai i helpim yupela long i stap gut wantaim God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause, I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

block.text: Mi ting long ol dispela samting Papa i bin mekim na mi save brukim skru long en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named.

block.text: Em i Papa bilong olgeta lain i stap long heven na long graun, na em yet i givim nem long olgeta dispela lain.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, that you may be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inward man.

block.text: Mi save brukim skru na prea olsem, Papa i bin makim ol planti gutpela gutpela samting tru bilong givim yupela, olsem na em i ken pulapim Holi Spirit bilong em long bel bilong yupela, na mekim yupela i stap strong tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith; to the end that you, being rooted and grounded in love.

block.text: Na long bilip bilong yupela, Krais i ken i stap long bel bilong yupela. Na pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela, em i ken kamap strong tru insait long bel bilong yupela na mekim yupela i sanap strong, olsem graun i save holimpas rop bilong diwai na mekim diwai i sanap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray that you may be strengthened to comprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth.

block.text: I pray that you may be strengthened to comprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I pray that you will know Christ’s love which surpasses knowledge, that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.

block.text: I pray that you will know Christ's love which surpasses knowledge, that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now to him who is able to do exceedingly abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that works in us,

block.text: Strong bilong God yet i save wok long bel bilong yumi, na dispela strong i winim tru tingting bilong yumi. Olgeta samting yumi save askim God long mekim, ol i no inap tru long mak bilong strong bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: to him be the glory in the assembly and in Christ Jesus to all generations forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: Olsem na oltaim oltaim ol manmeri bilong sios i mas litimapim nem bilong God long nem bilong Krais Jisas, inap long olgeta taim bihain. I tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 4
I therefore, the prisoner in the Lord, beg you to walk worthily of the calling with which you were called.

block.text: Mi Pol, mi stap long kalabus, long wanem, mi save mekim wok bilong Bikpela. Mi ting long God i bin singautim yupela long bihainim em tru, olsem na mi laik kirapim yupela long wokabaut stret long pasin em i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Walk with all lowliness and humility, with patience, bearing with one another in love.

block.text: Yupela i mas i stap aninit tru long ol arapela Kristen na mekim pasin isi long ol. Yupela i no ken belhat kwik long ol long taim ol i rongim yupela. Yupela wan wan i mas givim bel bilong yupela long ol na karim hevi ol i givim yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be eager to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.

block.text: Holi Spirit em i givim yumi pasin bilong i stap wanbel, na dispela pasin em i olsem rop i pasim yumi na yumi stap wanlain. Olsem na yupela i mas hatwok long holimpas dispela pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as you also were called in one hope of your calling;

block.text: I gat wanpela bodi tasol, na i gat wanpela Holi Spirit tasol. Olsem tasol God i singautim yupela bilong wetim wanpela samting tasol, em long God i ken inapim tru ol gutpela samting em i laik mekim long yumi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,

block.text: I gat wanpela Bikpela tasol, na wanpela pasin bilong bilip, na wanpela baptais tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: one God and Father of all, who is over all, and through all, and in us all.

block.text: I gat wanpela God, em i Papa bilong yumi olgeta. Em i antap long olgeta manmeri, na em i wok namel long olgeta manmeri, na em i stap insait long olgeta manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But to each one of us was the grace given according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
Therefore he says,

block.text: Krais i givim bikpela presen moa long yumi, na olsem tasol God i bin marimari moa yet long yumi olgeta wan wan.
Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “When he ascended on high, he led captivity captive, and gave gifts to men.”

block.text: "Em i go antap tru, na em i kisim bikpela lain kalabus i go wantaim em. Na em i givim ol presen long ol man."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now this, “He ascended,” what is it but that he also first descended into the lower parts of the earth?

block.text: Na dispela tok "em i go antap" em i soim yumi olsem Krais i no i go antap tasol. Nogat. Pastaim em i go daun insait long hap bilong graun i stap daunbilo tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He who descended is the one who also ascended far above all the heavens, that he might fill all things.

block.text: Dispela man pastaim em i go daun, em i go antap tu. Em i go antap tru long olgeta heven, bilong em i ken pulapim olgeta samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He gave some to be apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, shepherds and teachers;

block.text: Na em tasol i givim ol presen olsem. Long sampela man em i givim wok aposel. Na long sampela em i givim wok profet. Na long sampela em i givim wok bilong autim gutnius long ol manmeri. Na long sampela em i givim wok pasto na wok bilong skulim ol manmeri long ol pasin God i laikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for the perfecting of the saints, to the work of serving, to the building up of the body of Christ;

block.text: Krais i givim ol dispela presen bilong helpim yumi manmeri bilong God bai yumi inap long mekim gutpela wok bilong em. Olsem na bai bodi bilong Krais i ken kamap strong na i stap gut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: until we all attain to the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, to a full grown man, to the measure of the stature of the fullness of Christ.

block.text: Na dispela wok bai i go i go inap long yumi bilip tru na dispela i mekim yumi i stap wanbel tru, na yumi olgeta i save tru long Pikinini Bilong God. Olsem na Kristen laip bilong yumi bai i kamap strong na yumi bai kisim ol wankain gutpela pasin olsem Krasi yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then we will no longer be like children, tossed back and forth, carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the trickery of men, in craftiness, after the wiles of error.

block.text: Yumi bai i no inap i stap moa olsem ol liklik pikinini, na ol dispela tok bilong ol grisman i save tumas long olgeta pasin bilong trik na giaman, em bai i no inap sakim yumi nabaut olsem win na si i save sakim kanu long solwara, na kanu i trip nabaut na i no i go stret long ples em i makim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Speaking truth in love, we may grow up in all things into him, who is the head, Christ.

block.text: Yumi no ken putim yau long ol dispela kain tok. Nogat. Yumi mas bihainim pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela na mekim tok tru tasol long ol. Olsem bai yumi kamap strongpela manmeri na bai yumi pas tru wantaim Krais, em i het bilong yumi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: It is from Christ that all the body, being fitted and knit together through that which every joint supplies, according to the working in measure of each individual part, makes the body increase to the building up of itself in love.

block.text: na em i save mekim yumi olgeta han lek ai samting bilong bodi yumi mekim gut wok em i makim bilong yumi olgeta wan wan. Na em i save mekim yumi olgeta skru rop bun samting bilong bodi i pas gut wantaim na i bihainim pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela, na long dispela pasin bodi i save kamap bikpela na strongpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that you no longer walk as the rest of the Gentiles also walk, in the futility of their mind,

block.text: Olsem na mi laik mekim wanpela tok long yupela. Long nem bilong Bikpela mi tokaut strong olsem, yupela i no ken wokabaut moa long pasin bilong ol haiden. Tingting bilong ol i paul olgeta,

ReferenceBlocks.text: being darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God, because of the ignorance that is in them, because of the hardening of their hearts.

block.text: na save bilong ol i olsem tudak. Ol i no gat save tru, na bel bilong ol i pas, olsem na ol i stap ausait long laip bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Having become callous, they gave themselves up to lust, to work all uncleanness with greediness.

block.text: Ol i no save sem moa long pasin ol i save mekim. Ol i go insait tru long pasin nogut, na bel bilong ol i kirap tru long mekim ol kain kain pasin doti.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you did not learn Christ that way;
If indeed you heard him, and were taught in him, even as truth is in Jesus,

block.text: Mi ting yupela i harim pinis tok bilong Krais, na ol i skulim yupela pinis long tok tru i stap long Jisas. Na mi save, ol i no bin skulim yupela long mekim ol dispela pasin nogut bilong ol haiden.

ReferenceBlocks.text: put away your former way of life, the old man that grows corrupt after the lusts of deceit;

block.text: Bipo yupela tu i bin wokabaut long pasin bilong olpela man, em pasin bilong giaman na bel i kirap long mekim ol samting nogut, na em pasin i bringim man i go long rot bilong bagarap. Tasol nau yupela i mas rausim dispela olpela pasin

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be renewed in the spirit of your mind,

block.text: na tingting bilong yupela i mas kamap nupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: and put on the new man, who in the likeness of God has been created in righteousness and holiness of truth.

block.text: Yupela i mas kamap ol nupela manmeri, em ol manmeri God i mekim ol i kamap nupela na ol i stap olsem God yet, long wanem, pasin bilong ol i stretpela olgeta na i holi tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore putting away falsehood, speak truth each one with his neighbor. For we are members of one another.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas lusim pasin bilong giaman. Yupela olgeta i mas mekim tok tru tasol long ol arapela Kristen, long wanem, yumi olgeta i stap hap bilong wanpela bodi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Be angry, and don’t sin.” Don’t let the sun go down on your wrath,
neither give place to the devil.

block.text: Sapos bel bilong yupela i hat, orait yupela lukaut. Nogut yupela i mekim sin. Nogut yupela i belhat yet i stap na san i go daun.
Nogut yupela i opim dua long Satan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let him who stole steal no more; but rather let him labor, working with his hands the thing that is good, that he may have something to give to him who has need.

block.text: Ol stilman i no ken stil moa. Nogat. Nau ol i mas wok. Ol i mas mekim gutpela wok long han bilong ol yet, na ol bai i kisim planti samting, inap long ol i ken helpim ol man i sot long ol samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but such as is good for building up as the need may be, that it may give grace to those who hear.

block.text: Yupela i no ken larim ol kain kain tok nogut i kamap long maus bilong yupela. Nogat. Gutpela tok tasol i mas kamap, inap long strongim ol man i slek. Dispela kain tok i save bringim marimari bilong God i kam long ol man i harim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t grieve the Holy Spirit of God, in whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.

block.text: Yupela i no ken givim bel hevi long Holi Spirit bilong God. God i givim Holi Spirit long yupela olsem mak bilong yupela i stap ol manmeri bilong em stret, na bilong soim yupela olsem em i makim taim bilong kisim bek yupela na mekim yupela i kamap fri tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let all bitterness, wrath, anger, outcry, and slander, be put away from you, with all malice.

block.text: Yupela i mas rausim olgeta pasin bilong bel nogut na kros na belhat na bikmaus na tok bilas, na olgeta kain pasin nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving each other, just as God also in Christ forgave you.

block.text: Yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ol arapela Kristen na givim bel bilong yupela long ol. Yupela i mas lusim sin bilong ol, olsem God i lusim sin bilong yupela long nem bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 5
Be therefore imitators of God, as beloved children.

block.text: God i save laikim yupela tru, na yupela i stap pikinini bilong em. Olsem na yupela i mas bihainim ol pasin em yet i save mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Walk in love, even as Christ also loved you, and gave himself up for us, an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweet-smelling fragrance.

block.text: Yupela i mas wokabaut long pasin bilong laikim tru ol arapela, olsem Krais i bin laikim yumi tru na givim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim yumi. Em i givim laip bilong en long God olsem ofa i gat gutpela switpela smel.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But sexual immorality, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not even be mentioned among you, as becomes saints.

block.text: Yupela i no ken mekim pasin pamuk na olgeta kain pasin doti, na yupela i no ken mangalim ol samting bilong ol arapela. Tok bilong ol dispela pasin tu i no ken kamap liklik namel long yupela. I no inap yumi manmeri bilong God i toktok long ol dispela kain pasin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do not be guilty of filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not appropriate; but rather give thanks to God.

block.text: Yupela i no ken mekim tok doti na tok kranki na tok pilai nogut. Dispela kain pasin em i no inap long yumi mekim. Nogat. Mobeta yupela i tok tenkyu long God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Know this for sure, that no sexually immoral person, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, has any inheritance in the Kingdom of Christ and God.

block.text: Yupela i mas save gut olsem, ol manmeri bilong mekim pasin pamuk na olkain pasin doti, na ol manmeri bilong mangal, em wankain pasin olsem pasin bilong lotuim ol giaman god, ol dispela lain i no inap i kam insait long kingdom bilong Krais na God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Let no one deceive you with empty words. For because of these things, the wrath of God comes on the children of disobedience.

block.text: Yupela i mas lukaut gut, nogut yupela i bihainim ol rabis toktok nating bilong ol man i laik pulim yupela i go mekim ol dispela pasin nogut. Em ol dispela kain pasin tasol i save mekim God i belhat long ol man bilong sakim tok bilong em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore don’t be partakers with them.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i no ken poroman wantaim ol dispela kain man.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For you were once darkness, but are now light in the Lord. Walk as children of light.

block.text: Bipo yupela i stap long tudak, tasol nau Bikpela i putim yupela i stap long lait. Olsem na yupela i mas wokabaut olsem ol manmeri bilong lait.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth,

block.text: Lait em i save kamapim olgeta kain gutpela pasin na stretpela pasin na pasin bilong tok tru.

ReferenceBlocks.text: proving what is well pleasing to the Lord.

block.text: Yupela i mas trai long kisim save long ol pasin Bikpela i savelaikim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather even reprove them.

block.text: Yupela i no ken poroman wantaim ol man i save mekim pasin bilong tudak. Kain pasin olsem em i no save karim gutpela kaikai. Nogat. Mobeta yupela i mas soim ol man olsem, dispela kain pasin em i nogut.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the things which are done by them in secret, it is a shame even to speak of.

block.text: Mi no ken tokaut long ol pasin ol i save hait na mekim. Nogat. Mi sem long toktok long ol dispela kain samting.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But all things, when they are reproved, are revealed by the light, for everything that reveals is light.
Therefore he says,

block.text: Tasol lait i save kamapim as bilong olgeta pasin na mekim ol i stap ples klia.
Na taim lait i mekim wanpela samting i stap ples klia, orait dispela samting tu i kamap olsem lait. Olsem na dispela tok i stap,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Awake, you who sleep, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.”

block.text: "Yu man nau yu slip, yu mas kirap. Yu kirap long matmat na Krais bai i givim lait long yu."

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore watch carefully how you walk, not as unwise, but as wise;

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas lukaut gut long wokabaut bilong yupela. Yupela i no ken wokabaut olsem man i no gat save. Nogat. Yupela i mas wokabaut olsem man i gat save.

ReferenceBlocks.text: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

block.text: Nau yupela i gat taim bilong mekim pasin bilong God. Tasol dispela taim nau yumi stap long en, em i taim nogut, olsem na yupela i mas lukaut, nogut dispela taim i lus nating.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore don’t be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is.

block.text: Yupela i no ken mekim ol kranki pasin. Nogat. Yupela i mas save gut long laik bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Don’t be drunken with wine, in which is dissipation, but be filled with the Spirit.

block.text: Yupela i no ken dring planti na spak. Nogat. Dispela kain pasin i save bagarapim yupela. Yupela i mas larim Spirit bilong God i pulap long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Speak to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs; singing, and making melody in your heart to the Lord.

block.text: Na taim yupela i toktok wantaim ol arapela manmeri bilong God, yupela i mas kisim ol tok i stap long ol song bilong Buk Song na long ol arapela song bilong lotu na long ol song Holi Spirit i kamapim long bel bilong yupela, na putim insait long tok bilong yupela. Na yupela i mas singim ol song long Bikpela, long maus na long bel bilong yupela tu.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Give thanks always concerning all things in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, to God, even the Father.

block.text: Na oltaim yupela i mas givim tenkyu long God Papa long olgeta samting, long nem bilong Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Subject yourselves one to another in the fear of Christ.

block.text: Yupela i mas ting long Krais em i Bikpela bilong yupela, na yupela wan wan i mas i stap aninit long ol arapela man meri bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Wives, be subject to your own husbands, as to the Lord.

block.text: Yupela meri, yupela i mas aninit long ol man bilong yupela, olsem yupela i save aninit long Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the husband is the head of the wife, and Christ also is the head of the assembly, being himself the savior of the body.

block.text: Long wanem, man em i het bilong meri bilong en, olsem Krais em i het bilong sios. Sios em i bodi bilong Krais, na Krais i bin kisim bek em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But as the assembly is subject to Christ, so let the wives also be to their own husbands in everything.

block.text: Sios em i stap aninit long Krais. Olsem tasol yupela meri tu, oltaim yupela i mas aninit long ol man bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the assembly, and gave himself up for it.

block.text: Yupela man, yupela i mas laikim tumas ol meri bilong yupela, olsem Krais i laikim tumas sios na i givim laip bilong em yet bilong helpim sios.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He did this to sanctify it, having cleansed it by the washing of water with the word,

block.text: Long wara na long tok bilong en, Krais i wasim sios na mekim em i kamap klin long ai bilong en. Long dispela pasin em i makim sios i bilong em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: that he might present the assembly to himself gloriously, not having spot or wrinkle or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.

block.text: Em i laik mekim sios i kamap naispela tru long ai bilong em, na bai sios i no gat doti na grile na kain samting olsem. Nogat. Sios i ken i stap holi na i no gat asua.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even so husbands also ought to love their own wives as their own bodies. He who loves his own wife loves himself.

block.text: Olsem tasol yupela man, yupela i mas laikim tru ol meri bilong yupela, olsem yupela i save laikim bodi bilong yupela yet. Man i laikim tru meri bilong en, em i laikim tru em yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For no man ever hated his own flesh; but nourishes and cherishes it, even as the Lord also does the assembly;

block.text: Yumi save, i no gat wanpela man i save birua long bodi bilong em yet. Nogat. Em i save givim kaikai long en na lukautim gut, olsem Krais i save mekim long sios,

ReferenceBlocks.text: because we are members of his body, of his flesh and bones.

block.text: long wanem, yumi olsem lek han na ai samting bilong bodi bilong Krais. Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “For this cause a man will leave his father and mother, and will be joined to his wife. The two will become one flesh.”

block.text: "Olsem na man i save lusim papamama na i pas wantaim meri bilong en, na tupela i kamap wanpela bodi tasol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: This mystery is great, but I speak concerning Christ and of the assembly.

block.text: Dispela tok hait em i gat bikpela tingting bilong en. Mi yet, mi ting em i tok long Krais wantaim sios bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Nevertheless each of you must also love his own wife even as himself; and let the wife see that she respects her husband.

block.text: Tasol dispela tok i tok tu long yupela man wan wan long yupela i mas laikim tru meri bilong yupela, olsem yupela i save laikim yupela yet. Na meri i mas i stap aninit long man bilong en na mekim gutpela pasin long em.

ReferenceBlocks.text: EPHESIANS 6
Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.

block.text: Yupela pikinini, yupela i mas bihainim tok bilong papamama bilong yupela. Yupela olgeta i pas wantaim Bikpela, na dispela pasin em i stretpela pasin bilong yupela i mekim. Buk bilong God i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “Honor your father and mother,”

block.text: "Yu mas aninit long papamama bilong yu na bihainim tok bilong ol."

ReferenceBlocks.text: which is the first commandment with a promise:

block.text: Dispela lo em i namba wan lo i gat promis i stap wantaim, em promis i tok olsem,

ReferenceBlocks.text: “that it may be well with you, and you may live long on the earth.”

block.text: "Sapos yu mekim olsem, orait olgeta wok samting yu mekim i ken kamap gutpela, na bai yu stap longpela taim long dispela graun."

ReferenceBlocks.text: You fathers, don’t provoke your children to wrath, but nurture them in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.

block.text: Na yupela papa, yupela i no ken bagarapim tingting bilong ol pikinini bilong yupela na mekim ol i belhat long yupela. Nogat. Yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ai bilong Bikpela, na stretim gut ol pikinini bilong yupela na skulim ol long tok bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Servants, be obedient to those who according to the flesh are your masters, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as to Christ;

block.text: Yupela ol wokboi nating, yupela i mas aninit long ol bosman bilong yupela, na yupela i mas pret tru, nogut yupela i mekim pasin i no stret long ai bilong ol. Oltaim yupela i mas tingting strong long mekim gutpela wok tasol, long wankain pasin olsem yupela i save mekim long taim yupela i mekim wok bilong Krais.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do not work hard only when eyes are on you, as men pleasers; but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart.

block.text: Nogut yupela i ting long grisim ol na yupela i mekim gutpela wok long taim ol i stap klostu tasol. Nogat. Yupela i mas ting olsem yupela i stap wokboi nating bilong Krais yet, na bel bilong yupela i mas amamas long bihainim laik bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Do everything with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas belgut na mekim wok. I no olsem yupela i mekim wok bilong ol man. Nogat. Yupela i mekim wok bilong Bikpela yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Know that whatever good thing each one does, he will receive the same again from the Lord, whether he is bound or free.

block.text: Tingim. Sapos wanpela man i mekim gutpela wok, orait Bikpela bai i givim gutpela pe long em, maski dispela man em i wokboi nating o em i stap fri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You masters, do the same things to them, and give up threatening, knowing that he who is both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no partiality with him.

block.text: Na yupela ol bosman, yupela tu i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ol wokboi nating bilong yupela. Yupela i mas lusim pasin bilong pretim ol. Bikpela i stap long heven, em i Bikpela bilong yupela na bilong ol tu, na em i save skelim pasin bilong olgeta manmeri long wankain pasin tasol.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might.

block.text: Orait nau mi laik pinisim tok bilong mi olsem, yupela i pas wantaim Bikpela, olsem na yupela i mas tingting long olgeta bikpela strong bilong en, na yupela i mas sanap strong.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

block.text: Yupela i mas pasim olgeta klos pait God i save givim long yumi, na bai yupela inap long sanap strong na sakim olgeta kain pasin bilong trik na giaman Satan i save hait na mekim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of the darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places.

block.text: Tingim gut. Yumi no save pait long ol manmeri. Nogat. Yumi pait long ol strongpela spirit na ol gavman na ol kain kain samting i gat strong, ol i save bosim graun long dispela taim bilong tudak. Yumi pait long olgeta spirit nogut i stap antap.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and, having done all, to stand.

block.text: Olsem na yupela i mas kisim olgeta klos pait God i save givim yupela, na long taim nogut yupela bai inap sanap strong long pait. Na long taim pait i pinis, yupela bai i sanap strong i stap yet.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Stand therefore, having the utility belt of truth buckled around your waist, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,

block.text: Sapos yupela i laik sanap strong, orait yupela i mas pasim tok tru olsem let bilong yupela, na pasim stretpela pasin olsem siot kapa i karamapim bros bilong yupela,

ReferenceBlocks.text: and having fitted your feet with the preparation of the Good News of peace;

block.text: na yupela i mas redi long autim gutnius bilong God i laik wanbel wantaim ol manmeri, na putim dispela pasin olsem su bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: above all, taking up the shield of faith, with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one.

block.text: Yupela i mas kisim dispela olgeta samting bilong pait, na yupela i mas kisim tu pasin bilong bilip, na holim strong olsem hap plang, bai yupela inap long mekim i dai olgeta spia paia dispela man nogut Satan i save sutim i kam long yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God;

block.text: Yupela i mas tingting long God i kisim bek yupela pinis, na dispela tingting i mas i stap olsem hat kapa yupela i putim. Na yupela i mas holim bainat bilong Holi Spirit, em tok bilong God.

ReferenceBlocks.text: With all prayer and requests, pray at all times in the Spirit, and be watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:

block.text: Long strong bilong Holi Spirit yupela i mas prea oltaim. Yupela i mas strong long mekim ol kain kain beten na askim God long helpim yupela. Oltaim yupela i mas was gut bai yupela i no lusim dispela pasin. Yupela i no ken malolo. Oltaim yupela i mas prea na askim God long helpim olgeta manmeri bilong en.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Pray for me also, that I might speak without fear. Pray that I will use the right words to explain these difficult concepts in the Gospel.

block.text: Na yupela i mas askim God long helpim mi tu. Mi laik bai yupela i prea olsem, God i ken putim tok long maus bilong mi, na mi ken daunim pret na autim tru tok hait bilong gutnius.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I was sent to be an ambassador. Currently I am in chains for preaching the Gospel. I want to keep on speaking for Christ without fear, the way I should.

block.text: God yet i bin salim mi i go bilong autim dispela gutnius, na long dispela as tasol mi stap long kalabus. Mi gat wok bilong autim gutnius, olsem na yupela i mas prea long God i ken strongim mi, bai mi ken daunim pret na tokaut strong long ol manmeri.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That you also may know my affairs, how I am doing. Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will make known to you all things.

block.text: Tikikus bai i toksave long yupela long olgeta wok mi mekim. Tikikus em i brata tru bilong yumi, na em i gutpela wokman tru bilong Bikpela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have sent to you for this very purpose, that you may know our state, and that he may comfort your hearts.

block.text: Mi salim em i kam long yupela bai yupela i ken save, mipela i stap olsem wanem, na bai em i ken strongim bel bilong yupela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

block.text: God Papa wantaim Bikpela Jisas Krais em i ken mekim isi bel bilong yupela olgeta brata, na em i ken mekim yupela i bilip strong na i laikim tru ol arapela.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with incorruptible love. Amen.

block.text: God i ken mekim pasin bilong marimari long olgeta man i no save lusim pasin bilong laikim tru Bikpela bilong yumi Jisas Krais.
